name: Crystal Guardians (itch)
description:
Crystal guardians is a rogue-like tower defense game where you need to defend your base crystal on an expanding procedural generated battlefield. Gain a strategic advantage using the many towers + crystal combinations and unique item combinations stored in those towers. Make use of the expanding battlefield by placing towers on strategic position for maximal damage to the enemies.

Key features
  • Procedural generated levels, every run is different
  • 25 tower combinations
  • Upgrade towers using items
  • Currently over 50 items available
  • 5+ unique boss rounds
  • Progression system
  • 10+ different enemies
Procedural expansion

Keep expanding the battlefield while fighting off relentless waves of enemies. Use the newly gained grounds to gain an advantage on the enemies.

A rogue-like system

Buy and use items on your towers to create the optimal strategy for you. With currently over 50 items to choose from.

Unique Bosses

With over 5 bosses, you will need to be creative in order to defend the home base crystal.
